job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field

jd: From: Himanshu Pandey, WISE EQUATION SOLUTION INC himanshu@wiseq.net Reply to: himanshu@wiseq.net Job Title: Business Analyst Job Summary: We are seeking a detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will work closely with stakeholders to gather requirements, analyze business processes, and provide solutions to enhance operational efficiency.Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with stakeholders to define and document business requirements.Analyze current business processes and identify areas for improvement.Develop functional specifications and process flow diagrams.Assist in project planning, execution, and monitoring.Conduct data analysis to support decision-making processes.Facilitate workshops and meetings to gather feedback and insights.Create and maintain documentation related to business requirements and processes.Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field. years of experience in a business analyst role or similar position.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Proficiency in [specific tools/software, e.g., Excel, SQL, Visio].Knowledge of Agile methodologies is a plus. Thanks & RegardsHimanshu PandeySr. Technical Recruiter.14433451134 EXT 101
